page.title: 02Leisure survey _ Birkenhead
page.content: {Home Neighbourhood Place Club Pupils {28% 25% 32% 15% Parents {55% 5% 25% 15% { { }These figures show the results of a survey done by six schools,Summer 1985 Pupils and parents were asked about the venues of their leisure activities Pupils mostly travel to specific places such as a public pool .Slightly fewer occupy themselves in the home or belong to organisations or clubs (Church,Youth,Sport). Most parents spend free time in the home. A smaller pecentage travel to a specific place,sometimes accompanying their children. The same percentage of parents as pupils are members of clubs or organisations(judo,golf,football, rugby,keep fit,community groups etc.)
